game.name: Train Simulator: Feather River Canyon Enhanced — Premium Scenario Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience and enjoy more challenging and realistic railroading on the Train Simulator Classic Feather River Canyon Enhanced route, with High Iron Simulations’ Feather River Canyon Enhanced — Premium Scenario Pack!
